Welcome to the eLearning Web Application Docs
=============================================

.. image:: _static/icon-192x192.png
   :alt: Project Logo
   :align: center


Overview
--------

The eLearning web application is designed to facilitate online learning and communication between teachers and students. It provides a platform for teachers to create courses, upload study materials, and manage student enrollments. Students can access course materials, submit assignments, and participate in discussions. The application features authentication and authorization mechanisms to ensure secure access to its functionalities.


Key Features
------------
- *Search User Autocomplete*
- *Course Creation and Management*
- *Study Material Upload*
- *Student Enrollment Management*
- *Assignment Submission*
- *Websocket Chatgroup*


Check out the :doc:`usage` section for further information.

.. note::

   This project is under active development.
